EmailTemplate.description: Email notification to customer when request status is "Pending Customer Response"
EmailTemplate.name: Application Pending Customer Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Application pending your response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your temporary sign request. The request is pending. Please respond with the requested information by due [TBD- Request Expiration Date field] or the request will expire.
To view your online request, follow the link provided below:
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
